parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Ip Address
parameter.description: The ip address of the elk alarm system.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The port to connect to on the elk alarm system.

parameter.name: pincode
parameter.label: Pincode
parameter.description: The pincode to use for privileged actions like arming and disarming.

parameter.name: useSSL
parameter.label: Use Secure Port
parameter.description: When enabled the binding will connect assuming a secure port rather than an insecure one. Username and password required.

channel-type.label: General Trouble
channel-type.description: On if any trouble status is on.

channel-type.label: AC Fail Trouble
channel-type.description: AC (power) has failed, system is running on battery backup.

channel-type.label: Box Tamper Trouble
channel-type.description: Contact box (wireless) has been tampered with. Zone that was tampered with will be in box_tamper_zone.

channel-type.label: Box Tamper Trouble Zone
channel-type.description: Zone that contains contact box (wireless) which has been tampered with.

channel-type.label: Fail Communicate
channel-type.description: Unable to communicate to the central station. A successful communication is required to clear.

channel-type.label: EEProm Memory Error Trouble
channel-type.description: EEProm memory has encountered an error.

channel-type.label: Low Battery Control Trouble
channel-type.description: System backup battery low and may need to be replaced.

channel-type.label: Transmitter Low Battery Trouble
channel-type.description: Wireless transmitter has low battery. Zone will be in transmitter_low_battery_trouble.

channel-type.label: Transmitter Low Battery Trouble Zone
channel-type.description: Zone that contains wireless transmitter which has low battery.

channel-type.label: Over Current Trouble
channel-type.description: Over current condition detected. Hardware should be tested.

channel-type.label: Telephone Fault Trouble
channel-type.description: Telephone reporting line has faulted. Test telephone line, or disable if unused.

channel-type.label: Output 2 Trouble
channel-type.description: Siren output (supervised output 2) fault. Test siren, or add resistor across output 2 if unused.

channel-type.label: Missing Keypad Trouble
channel-type.description: Keypad is missing. Check keypad connection.

channel-type.label: Zone Expander Trouble
channel-type.description: Zone expander problem. Check zone expander connection.

channel-type.label: Output Expander Trouble
channel-type.description: Output expander problem. Check output expander connection.

channel-type.label: ELKRP Remote Access Trouble
channel-type.description: ELKRP Remote Access Trouble.

channel-type.label: Common Area Not Armed Trouble
channel-type.description: Common Area Not Armed Trouble.

channel-type.label: Flash Memory Error Trouble
channel-type.description: Flash memory has encountered an error.

channel-type.label: Security Alert Trouble
channel-type.description: Security alert. Zone will be in security_alert_zone.

channel-type.label: Security Alert Zone
channel-type.description: Zone that contains security alert. Check zone for problems.

channel-type.label: Serial Port Expander Trouble
channel-type.description: Serial port expander problem. Check serial port expander connection.

channel-type.label: Lost Transmitter Trouble
channel-type.description: Transmitter is not communicating. Zone of lost transmitter will be in lost_transmitter_zone.

channel-type.label: Lost Transmitter Zone
channel-type.description: Zone that contains wireless transmitter that has been lost.

channel-type.label: GE Smoke CleanMe Trouble
channel-type.description: GE smoke detector optical port needs replacement.

channel-type.label: Ethernet Trouble
channel-type.description: Ethernet expansion module trouble or reporting over ethernet problem.

channel-type.label: Display Message Line 1
channel-type.description: Message is displayed in line 1.

channel-type.label: Display Message Line 2
channel-type.description: Message is displayed in line 2.

channel-type.label: Fire Trouble
channel-type.description: Fire trouble. Zone will be in fire_trouble_zone.

channel-type.label: Fire Zone
channel-type.description: Zone that contains fire trouble.
